dublin_core.dcvalue: For many organizations limited budgets and phased funding restrict the development of digital health tools This problem is often exacerbated by the ever increasing sophistication of technology and costs related to programming and maintenance Traditional development methods tend to be costly and inflexible and not client centered The purpose of this study is to analyze the use of Agile software development and outcomes of a three phase mHealth program designed to help young adult Quebecers quit smoking
I'll txt U if I have a problem: how the Société canadienne du cancer in Quebec applied behavior-change theory, data mining and agile software development to help young adults quit smoking.
